entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 40%

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 40%

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning near noon. Risk of snow squalls in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
